location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Rough sketch of Northern Section of Perso-Baluch Frontier’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:330 x 245 mm.Materials:Pen and pencil on paper.

mods.abstract: Sketch map illustration the northern frontier between Persia [Iran] and British Baluchistan [in present-day Pakistan]. The map is marked with two lines: a blue line, actually drawn in black and indicating the border as determined by the Holdich Agreement, and a red line, being the approximate limits of British occupation. The map also indicates: the position of several towns and villages; levy posts; the Tahlab and Ladis [Lādīz] rivers; the railway line to Zahidan [Zahedan].
